llm_res.rule: Transfer of ownership of any NFT changes by any mechanism must emit the Transfer event. This event emits when NFTs are created (`from` == 0) and destroyed (`to` == 0).
llm_res.function: Ensure Transfer event is emitted correctly in all transfer, mint, and burn functions.

llm_res.rule: The contract must implement the ERC721 and ERC165 interfaces.
llm_res.function: Not fully implemented or incorrectly implemented ERC721 and ERC165 interfaces.

llm_res.rule: The function SHOULD throw unless the _from account has deliberately authorized the sender of the message via some mechanism.
